properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 8:43AM CST until February 24 at 4:54AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Cahaba River Near Suttle Affecting Dallas and Perry Counties.

.Rises are occurring on the Cahaba River near Suttle...and a flood
warning is now in effect there.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Cahaba River Near Suttle.
* from Saturday afternoon to late Sunday night...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At  8:00 AM Thursday The stage Was 22.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 32 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Saturday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 34.5 feet by Sunday morning. The river
will fall below flood stage by Sunday afternoon.
* Impact...At 32 feet...Flooding of pasture lands and low-lying
agricultural lands occurs in the Suttle area.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
